content: üìÇ¬†Explore  Blog Posts on Medium [#] (#frontmatter-title)  =  Not comfortable with academic-style papers? The following Blog Posts explain the Whitepaper in smaller digestible articles along with other articles as API3 moves forward. You can find all our blog posts on [API3 Medium] (https://medium.com/api3) ‚ûö or on [Benligiray Medium] (https://bbenligiray.medium.com) ‚ûö . @tab:By Category About our journey: Getting APIs on the Blockchain [APIs: The Digital Glue] (https://medium.com/api3/apis-the-digital-glue-7ac87566e773) - Oct 4, 2020 [The API Connectivity Problem] (https://medium.com/api3/the-api-connectivity-problem-bd7fa0420636) - Oct 11, 2020 [Where are the first-party oracles?] (https://medium.com/api3/where-are-the-first-party-oracles-5078cebaf17) - Oct 26, 2020 [Staking & oracles] (https://medium.com/api3/staking-oracles-c91f2f5bcf6d) - Nov 4, 2020 [Why security must be quantified] (https://medium.com/api3/why-security-must-be-quantified-3d2dd06c4909) - Nov 15, 2020 [Hello ChainAPI!] (https://medium.com/api3/hello-chainapi-e1b386a74f1d) - Jan 5, 2021 [Sunsetting Honeycomb, and a Retrospective] (https://medium.com/clc-group/sunsetting-honeycomb-and-a-retrospective-ba3f58268024) - Jan 5, 2021 [Story of the Authoritative DAO] (https://bbenligiray.medium.com/story-of-the-authoritative-dao-1153990a3eff) - Jun 30, 2021 [What is API3?] (https://bbenligiray.medium.com/what-is-api3-d97fdfe94e19) - Jul 16, 2021 [Beacons: Building blocks for Web3 data connectivity] (https://medium.com/api3/beacons-building-blocks-for-web3-data-connectivity-df6ad3eb5763) - Dec 17, 2021 [What are Beacons?
